name: Post Processing VR
description:
As a normal blue-collar worker, the only thing you wish for is a job well done.

Packages have always been of interest to you and the day you were recruited by the postal services was the most glorious day of your sad life.

Luckily enough, you were assigned to the most stressful shift there is.

 With tough challenges and an ironed tie, you venture into yet another exciting day at the postal warehouse!

This game was developed in six weeks by a small team of student at Game Programmer, Yrgo. Gothenburg, Sweden. 

Programmers

Amie Faily
Johan Appelgren
Jonathan Aronsson-Olsson
Kian Dan Parsa
Michael Håkansson
Simon Ektjärn

Computer Graphics

Amanda Ljungström
Ernesto Zorilla
Jenny 
Mia LI
Olof Barr
Susanna 

Controls

Trigger - Grip objects
Track Pad Press - Send away cages, while holding the in-game remote
